---
title: "Sony Properties"
---

## Aperture (`0x5007`)

Get/Set the aperture value.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Custom Codec

---

## ShutterSpeed (`0xd20d`)

Get/Set the shutter speed.

**Datatype:** UINT32

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Custom Codec

---

## Iso (`0xd21e`)

Get/Set the ISO sensitivity.

**Datatype:** UINT32

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Custom Codec

---

## Exposure (`0x0`)

Exposure (either metered or manually set)

**Datatype:** INT16

**Access:** Get

**Codec Type:** Base Codec

---

## MeteredExposure (`0xd1b5`)

AKA Metered Manual Level - Get the metered manual level.

**Datatype:** INT16

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Custom Codec

---

## ExposureCompensation (`0x5010`)

AKA Exposure Bias Compensation - Get/Set the exposure bias compensation.

**Datatype:** INT16

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Custom Codec

---

## StillCaptureMode (`0x5013`)

Get/Set the drive mode.

**Datatype:** UINT32

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | Normal | Normal |
| `0x10002` | Continuous Shooting Hi | Continuous Shooting Hi |
| `0x18010` | Continuous Shooting Hi+ | Continuous Shooting Hi+ |
| `0x18011` | Continuous Shooting Hi-Live | Continuous Shooting Hi-Live |
| `0x18012` | Continuous Shooting Lo | Continuous Shooting Lo |
| `0x18013` | Continuous Shooting | Continuous Shooting |
| `0x18014` | Continuous Shooting Speed Priority | Continuous Shooting Speed Priority |
| `0x18015` | Continuous Shooting Mid | Continuous Shooting Mid |
| `0x18016` | Continuous Shooting Mid-Live | Continuous Shooting Mid-Live |
| `0x18017` | Continuous Shooting Lo-Live | Continuous Shooting Lo-Live |
| `0x20003` | Timelapse | Timelapse |
| `0x38003` | Self Timer 5 Sec. | Self Timer 5 Sec. |
| `0x38004` | Self Timer 10 Sec. | Self Timer 10 Sec. |
| `0x38005` | Self Timer 2 Sec. | Self Timer 2 Sec. |
| `0x4c237` | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c23f` | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48337` | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48537` | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x48737` | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 7 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 7 Img. |
| `0x48937` | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 9 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.3 EV 9 Img. |
| `0x4c257` | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c25f` | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48357` | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48557` | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x48757` | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 7 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 7 Img. |
| `0x48957` | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 9 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.5 EV 9 Img. |
| `0x4c277` | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c27f` | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48377` | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48577` | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x48777` | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 7 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 7 Img. |
| `0x48977` | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 9 Img. | Continuous Bracket 0.7 EV 9 Img. |
| `0x4c211` | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c219` | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48311` | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48511` | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x48711` | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 7 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 7 Img. |
| `0x48911` | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 9 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.0 EV 9 Img. |
| `0x4c241` | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c249` | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48341` | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48541` | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x48741` | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 7 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.3 EV 7 Img. |
| `0x4c261` | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c269` | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48361` | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48561` | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x48761` | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 7 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.5 EV 7 Img. |
| `0x4c281` | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c289` | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48381` | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48581` | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x48781` | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 7 Img. | Continuous Bracket 1.7 EV 7 Img. |
| `0x4c221` | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c229` | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48321` | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48521` | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x48721` | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 7 Img. | Continuous Bracket 2.0 EV 7 Img. |
| `0x4c251` | Continuous Bracket 2.3 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 2.3 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c259` | Continuous Bracket 2.3 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 2.3 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48351` | Continuous Bracket 2.3 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 2.3 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48551` | Continuous Bracket 2.3 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 2.3 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x4c271` | Continuous Bracket 2.5 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 2.5 EV 2 Img. + |
| `0x4c279` | Continuous Bracket 2.5 EV 2 Img. - | Continuous Bracket 2.5 EV 2 Img. - |
| `0x48371` | Continuous Bracket 2.5 EV 3 Img. | Continuous Bracket 2.5 EV 3 Img. |
| `0x48571` | Continuous Bracket 2.5 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 2.5 EV 5 Img. |
| `0x4c291` | Continuous Bracket 2.7 EV 2 Img. + | Continuous Bracket 2.7 EV 2 Img. + |

| `0x48591` | Continuous Bracket 2.7 EV 5 Img. | Continuous Bracket 2.7 EV 5 Img. |

---

## OsdImageMode (`0xd207`)

Get/Set the OSD image mode

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x0` | OFF | OFF |
| `0x1` | ON | ON |

---

## LiveViewStatus (`0xd221`)

Get the live view status.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** Get

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x0` | SUPPORTED_DISABLED | SUPPORTED_DISABLED |
| `0x1` | SUPPORTED_ENABLED | SUPPORTED_ENABLED |
| `0x2` | NOT_SUPPORTED | NOT_SUPPORTED |

---

## StillImageSaveDestination (`0xd222`)

Get the information of still image save destination.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | CAMERA_DEVICE | CAMERA_DEVICE |
| `0x10` | HOST_DEVICE | HOST_DEVICE |
| `0x11` | BOTH_DEVICES | BOTH_DEVICES |

---

## PositionKeySetting (`0xd25a`)

Get/Set the position key setting (controls which setting takes priority between host and camera)

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x0` | CAMERA_PRIORITY | CAMERA_PRIORITY |
| `0x1` | HOST_PRIORITY | HOST_PRIORITY |

---

## SetLiveViewEnable (`0xd313`)

Set live view enable. When using Live View while connected in "Remote Control with Transfer Mode," it is necessary to enable the feature using this Control Code.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | DISABLE | DISABLE |
| `0x2` | ENABLE | ENABLE |

---

## SetPostViewEnable (`0xd312`)

Set post view enable. When using Live View while connected in "Remote Control with Transfer Mode," it is necessary to enable the feature using this Control Code.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | DISABLE | DISABLE |
| `0x2` | ENABLE | ENABLE |

---

## ShootingFileInfo (`0xd215`)

Get the shooting file info. 0x0000 indicates no files are available, 0x0001 - 0x7FFF indicate files exist. 0x8001 and over indicate the files are ready for transfer.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** Get

**Codec Type:** Base Codec

---

## ShutterHalfReleaseButton (`0xd2c1`)

Control shutter half-release (S1) (focus) button.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | UP | UP |
| `0x2` | DOWN | DOWN |

---

## ShutterReleaseButton (`0xd2c2`)

Control shutter release (S2) button.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | UP | UP |
| `0x2` | DOWN | DOWN |

---

## S1S2Button (`0xd2e6`)

Execute shutter half-release (S1) and shutter release (S2) buttons.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | UP | UP |
| `0x2` | DOWN | DOWN |

---

## MovieRecButton (`0xd2c8`)

Control movie record button (hold)

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | UP | UP |
| `0x2` | DOWN | DOWN |

---

## LiveViewImageQuality (`0xd26a`)

Get/Set the live view image quality.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** GetSet

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x1` | LOW | LOW |
| `0x2` | HIGH | HIGH |

---

## ContentTransferEnable (`0xd295`)

Get the contents transfer enabled status.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** Get

**Codec Type:** Enum Codec

### Valid Values

| Value | Name | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |
| `0x0` | DISABLE | DISABLE |
| `0x1` | ENABLE | ENABLE |

---

## FocusIndication (`0xd213`)

Get the focus indication.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** Get

---
